  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3101</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading cards No1-Lead Paragraphs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesekarten No1-Lead Paragraphen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Paragraphes des cartes No1-Lead de lecture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Parágrafos dos cartões No1-Lead da leitura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Paragrafi delle schedi No1-Lead della lettura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παράγραφοι νο1-μολύβδου καρτών ανάγνωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Párrafos de las tarjetas No1-Lead de la lectura</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an assgnment where the student is required to extract relevant information for a specific purpose and do some exercises.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein assgnment, in dem der 
Kursteilnehmer benoetigt wird, relevante Informationen zu einem 
spezifischen Zweck zu extrahieren und einige Übungen zu tun.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un assgnment où l'étudiant est requis 
d'extraire l'information appropriée pour un but spécifique et de 
faire quelques exercices.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um assgnment onde o estudante seja 
requerido extrair a informação relevante para uma finalidade 
específica e fazer alguns exercícios.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un assgnment dove l'allievo è tenuto ad 
estrarre le informazioni relative per uno scopo specifico ed a fare 
alcune esercitazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα assgnment όπου ο σπουδαστής πρέπει
για να εξαγάγει τις σχετικές πληροφορίες για έναν συγκεκριμένο 
σκοπό και να κάνει μερικές ασκήσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un assgnment donde requieren al 
estudiante extraer la información relevante para un propósito 
específico y hacer algunos ejercicios.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesefähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">qualifications de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">linguaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">habilidades de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
